name: The Purr-fect Catch
description:
The first game I made ever. Created at the Spring 2016 Game Jam held by the UC Davis Game Development and Arts Club. Co-created with Bayan Mashat and music by Kristen Kirk.

Goal:

  • Reach the surface before time runs out (30 seconds per level)
  • Catch fish to increase your score
  • The greater the score after 3 levels, the happier the cat is
  • Touching a shark decreases the amount of time you have

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move
